attributes.action: cap the amount of legislation introduced by each Parliament and consider removing one piece of outdated legislation for each one introduced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will ensure that PROPER consideration is given to each piece of legislation, that careful checks are made to ascertain whether effective legislation already exists and will stop legislation being introduced simply as a knee jerk reaction to the agenda of the tabloid press.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
